body_html:
+1 Would appreciate tensorflow maintained docker images with python 3.6 and ubuntu 18.04 (if it has to be ubuntu, a smaller image would be nice).

Isn't this achievable by upping the ubuntu version to 18.04 in spec.yml?
body_text:
+1 Would appreciate tensorflow maintained docker images with python 3.6 and ubuntu 18.04 (if it has to be ubuntu, a smaller image would be nice).
Isn't this achievable by upping the ubuntu version to 18.04 in spec.yml?
body:
+1 Would appreciate tensorflow maintained docker images with python 3.6 and ubuntu 18.04 (if it has to be ubuntu, a smaller image would be nice).

Isn't this achievable by upping the ubuntu version to 18.04 in [spec.yml](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/dockerfiles/spec.yml)?
